reviewText: This was everything I wanted to give my son for his birthday.  He loved it!

I got this gift set for my two kids. They loved that the movie, book and sleigh bell all came together in a nice box. This was a beautiful tradition my family has started. My daughter gets excited every time she sees the box in my hands!
came on time actaully faster than we expected ..it was eveythign we hoped it would be made my kids day we love this <3

We were given this book as a gift & fell in love with it, so we ordered this gift set as a gift!  The birthday girl & her parents fell in love too!  We didn't see the gift set (it was shipped directly to them) but they said it was well done & they hung the bell immediately on the tree.
Bought this set the year it as first available.  My grandchildren, and their parents, loved it.  Bought it this year for my youngest grandchild.  I'm sure he'll love it too

The Polar Express Holiday Gift Set
is a great deal The Polar Expess is a timeless story and to get all three in the set was perfect.
Bought this for a two-year-old for her birthday and she loved it! Like that it includes the book, DVD, and bell. Fun gift.
My grandson loves this movie.  He carries the bell around the house.
